drives.title: Ambition
drives.text: Advance when you increase your reputation with any faction.

drives.title: Clean Paws
drives.text: Advance when you accomplish an illicit, criminal goal while maintaining a believable veneer of innocence.

drives.title: Principles
drives.text: Advance when you express or embody your moral principles at great cost to yourself or your allies.

drives.title: Justice
drives.text: Advance when you achieve justice for someone wronged by a powerful, wealthy, or high-status individual.

nature.title: Extrovert
nature.text: Clear your exhaustion track when you share a moment of real warmth, friendship, or enjoyment with someone.

nature.title: Peacemaker
nature.text: Clear your exhaustion track when you resolve a dangerous conflict nonviolently.

connections.title: Partner
connections.text: _______ and I fought alongside each other to defend a clearing from a factions advances...but we failed. Why did we defend the clearing? Why did we fail? Who defeated us?
connections.benefit: When you fill in this connection, you each mark 2-prestige with the faction you helped, and mark 2-notoriety with the faction you harmed. During play, if you are spotted together, then any prestige or notoriety gains withthosefactionsaredoubledforthetwo of you.

connections.title: Friend
connections.text: I traveled with _______ for a time right after I became a vagabond. They helped keep me safe and showed me the Woodland. What keepsake did I gift them?
connections.benefit: When you help them, you can mark 2-exhaustion to give a +2, instead of 1-exhaustion for a +1.
